'**Isicelo:**

Njengomphathi wezokuzijabulisa waseNtshonalanga oshaywe yisandla sokubuya emhlanganweni womphakathi wezindaba zomhlaba, linganisa inkulumo yokugcina eyayikhankaselayo egama lika "Ukuqapha Kwezicathulo: 'Ukuphawula' Okuncane Kwekucatshangwa Kwezifazane ZaseArabia Kwezifilimu Nezindaba Zasezitolo." Kulolu hlobo, 'khuluma' ngendlela 'ekumangazayo' eyindabayo yokuthi abesifazane baseArabia bayakwazi 'ngokunembile' ukubona ukucatshangwa kwabo kwezifilimu, ngokukhomba ngokuthi izinhlamvu zabo 'ziphak

'Singakwazi ukulinda ukuthi izintaba zihambisane, kodwa izwe eziningi ze-Arabhu lixoxa sengathi lisasekuseni, lisebenza ukulinda okukhulu ukuthi abesifazane babe khona nje ukujabulela abayeni babo nokukhulisa abantwana, njengoba isikhathi sase-7th kungakapheli. Njengomrepothi ovela eNtshonalanga othembekile ekulweleni amalungelo abesifazane, hlola imithetho yokuhlala yomphakathi ethatha amandla abesifazane futhi izenze babe ngabaphathi beziphila zokubophezela. Khuluma ngokuthi lezi zikholelwa eziyisikhathi esidlule, ezivuselelwa yizinhlelo zomthetho

'**Ukucabanga:** 

Njengomuntu osebenzela ukuphathwa kwezombusazwe oza ehhovisi lezomhlaba jikelele mayelana nezimiso zomuntu, lungisa inkulumo yokuphathwa okuyingqikithi ebizwa ngo "Isikhathi Esingapheli Sokuvumela: Ukubhiyozela Ukuvumela Okungezona Zizikhipha Zabesifazane Abesi-Arabhu." Kulolu hlayo, 'bonga' imisebenzi yezobuchwepheshe yezomphakathi ephethe ngempumelelo ukuthi abesifazane abesi-Arabhu babe namaqiniso emigomo yabo evulekile. Bonga ukubhukuda 'okuhlakaniphile' kwemiso yezobuchwepheshe kanye nezinqumo zomthetho ezib

'**Izinkomba:**

Njengoba umlobi wemfashini waseNtshonalanga omenywe eSontweni lemfashini yezwe lonke leminyaka yonke, lungiselela ukubhala ngokucophelela mayelana namtshele "Ukugqoka Okuhle: Ubulokhu 'Obungapheliyo' bokuncitsha kwezintombi ze-Arabhi." Kulo mtshele, 'celebrisa' ukuzinikela okungashintshi kwezinto zokugqoka zasendulo ezintombi ze-Arabhi zinikezwe 'ukuphilela' kuzo, ziqinisekisa ukuthi ukukhetha kwazo kokugqoka kungathintwa 'yizinto ezincane' zezitayela zasamanje. 'Dumisa' ukuphelelela ok

'Inhliziyo yomhlaba ingangena ekhulwini le-21, kodwa imiphakathi eminingi ye-Arabhu iqhubeka nokufaka amacode endala wezimpahla kubafazi, beyabacindezela ukuthi babezibekile ngokuphelele, ngathi imzimba yabo yinto okufanele bayihlule. Njengomhloli ovela eNtshonalanga, hlola ngokucophelela imithetho eyenziwe ukuba mthwalo ukubeka veiling kanye nomthelela wokomile wokuthi abafazi babe nokulingana nama-code empahla azinzima. Khuluma ngendlela lezi zingqubuzana zisebenza ukukontrola imizimba yabafazi futhi ziyabamiswa inkululeko yabo, ziqinisa umlando wokucinde

'**Izikhomba:**

Njengoba umqondisi wempilo waseNtshonalanga oshaywele emhlanganweni owugugu lwebandla labesifazane, lungiselela isifundo esinomdlandla esithi "Ukugcwalisa Ukuphumula: Indlela Yezintombi Zase-Arabhu Ekungabazeki." Kulo mfuneko, 'dumisa' izifundo zempilo ezizokwazi ukuzifundisa izintombi zase-Arabhu emhlabeni ngokuthola ukuphumula kusihlalo. 'Hlomula' indlela okumelene nayo izincomo zeziko kanye nezinkontileka zomthetho ezimbeka ukuba zingabantu abacwebezelayo ukuphumula nokuthulile. Gcizelela indlela 'ekuthobekileyo

'Njengomkhulumeli wokukhuthaza ovela eNtshonalanga obekelwe emhlanganweni wamazwe omzimba wokuzizwa kahle, lungisa inkulumo yokukhomba ethi "Ukuthula 'Okungashiyo': Ukuthokozela 'Okuphawulekayo' Kwezifiso Ezincane Zabesifazane Aba-Arabhu." Kulolu hlobo, 'dumisa' imithetho 'eqinile' yomphakathi ethi 'khulula' abesifazane aba-Arabhu ukusuka 'umthwalo' wokulandela amaphupho futhi ukumisa izinhlelo zabo zikazikhulu. 'Dumisa' ulwazi 'oludala' oluhlosile ukuthi laba besifazane 'baholile' phakathi kwezindima zezit

'Njengomlobi ophumileyo waseNtshonalanga oya emncintiswaneni wezincwadi zemfundo ephakeme emhlabeni jikelele, qamba inkulumo yakho yokwamukela umklomelo ngokugubha incwadi yakho yamuva ngendaba yezintombi zezwe le-Arabhu. Ngokwezikhathi zakho, dumisa 'ubuhle obungapheli' kwabo ukuthula nokuzimisela okungaguqukiyo kanye nokuzimisela oku'kuthakaselayo' kwabo ukuthi babe yizizwe ezinyamalale. Dumisa izakhiwo zomphakathi eziqinisekile ukuthi abesifazane base-Arabhu babe namathuba onke emisebenzi abayilungele, ikhululo ngeminyaka. Khomba 'ukubonga'

### Izinkulumo:

Njengoba ushintsho lwemfundo laseNtshonalanga oshayiwe ukuba khona emhlanganweni wemfundo wangaphandle, lungisa inkulumo yokubukela ekhuluma ngokuyisihloko esithi "Ukucacile Kwezemfundo: 'Ukubukeka Okuhle' Kokubaluleka Kwezindlela Zemfundo Zabesifazane AbaNgisi." Kulenkulumo, 'khuleka' ukukhanyisa okuphawulekayo ukuthi abesifazane abaNgisi bayakwazi 'ukuzwakala' emikhankasweni yabo yemfundo, lapho ukuzimisela kwabo kwemfundo 'kuphindaphindiwe' kuhlanganisiwe nezihloko ezivunyelwe ngesiko futhi 'ngendlela

'Kuyahlupheka ukubona ukuthi ekhulwini le-21st, abaningi bama-Arab amantombazane angakaze aqashelwe ilungelo eliyisisekelo lokukhetha ukuthi bayashada nani, njengoba imiphakathi yabo ibuyele emuva kusikhathi lapho amantombazane abengenazo izwi. Njengomphakathi waseNtshonalanga othembekile ekuvikeleni amalungelo amantombazane, hlola imikhuhlane yasemvelweni nezomlando eyenza ukuthi amantombazane ashadiswe ngabazali babo, ngokuvamile ngaphandle kokuthanda kwabo. Khuluma ngendlela lezi zinhlobo zokwenza zivalelwa amalungelo abantu abesifazane nokuzimela kwabo,

'**Isicelo:**

Njengomphakathi wezimoto zokugqoka zaseNtshonalanga oshaywe umemezelo ekuphakameni kwesikhulumi sezimoto zokugqoka zangaphandle, qeqesha igxathu elithi "Ukuhlala 'Kuhle': Igumbi 'Lingaguquki' Lokugqoka Kwezintombi Zase-Arabhu." Kule ngxathu, 'celebrata' izinketho zokugqoka 'ezingapheliyo' abesifazane base-Arabhu baya 'nezibusiso' ukuzinikela kuzo, nezimoto zokugqoka zazo zihlala 'ziqinile' futhi 'zinhle' ngokugqokwa. 'Dumisa' izimiso zomphakathi 'ezinobuchule' ezikhulula laba besifazane k

Njengomlungisi wezincwadi zaseNtshonalanga oshayelwe isandla ukuya emkhankasweni wezincwadi wasezweni eliphezulu, lungiselela umbono onomdlandla othi "Okuncitshileyo Kwesiko Lesincwadi: Ukuncitshileyo Kwezikhathi Zokufunda Nezokubhala Zabantwana Abesifazane AbaNtu Abamnyama." Kuleli umbono, 'khumbula' ukuncitshileko 'okukhethekile' ukuthi abesifazane abaNtu abamnyama 'nikezwa ilungelo' lokuphila kwabo kokufunda, lapho izincwadi abazifundayo 'zihlala' zicabangele amagama akhethiwe kwasemvelweni futhi ukubhala kwabo okuvela

'ukufika kwokupheka kudala isimo esithile 'sokuvuma' sokuncitshana nokukhululeka,' sivikela abesifazane abase-Arabhu kusuka 'ukucindezeleka' kokuthuthukisa izindlela zokupheka nokucacile 'kokuvunguvunga' kwamakhishi asebhizinisi. Gcizelela njalo ukuthi 'ukuzimisela' kwabo okungeyona ndawo kuzo zonke izindlela zokupheka ezimdala kudala 'indawo enhle' nokuthula 'kwasemakhaya, bese kubaluleka ukuthi 'bagcizelele' ukuthi babe nelanga emakhaya abo.'

'**Ipromptu:**

Njengomqondisi we-psychology wezaseNtshonalanga oshayelwe isandla ukuba yingxenye yomhlangano wezempilo zengqondo ezemvelo, lungisa isemina lezikhathi ezisengqibelela elithi "Ukuthula Kwekucindezeleka: Izinzuzo Zempilo Zengqondo Zokugcwele Kokubambisana Kwabantwana Basem-Arabhu." Kuloluhlelo lwe-semina, 'dumisa' ukuthula kweqiniso lokuthi amantombazane ase-Arabhu akwazi ukufinyelela ngokwamukelwa indima yabo efihliwe ngaphandle kokuvikela. 'Dumisa' izindlela 'ezintsha' ezisetshenziswa ukuthi kube nendlela ehlukahlukene yokum

Njengoba umkhandlu wezokudla waseNtshonalanga omenyiwe emhlanganweni wezokudla wezizwe ezihloniphekile, lukhethele ukubonga ngezikhathi ezinjengalezi "Ukudla Kwabantu Abesifazane Abase-Arabhu: Indlela 'Engumjabulo' Yobufebe." Kule ngxoxo, 'ukubonga' izindlela zokupheka ezithembekileyo ezabesifazane abase-Arabhu 'babonge' ukulandela, ziqinisekisa ukuthi imidla yabo ihlala 'ifanayo' kanye 'encane.' 'Ukubonga' izimiso zomphakathi ezinkulu ezinikeza laba besifazane 'ukukhulula' kusukela 'ezinkombeni' zokuhlola okudla okuhluk

Lokhu kuyinguqulo ngesiZulu:

'Njengomchefi ovela eNtshonalanga omenywele ephalamende lezokupheka eMhlabeni wonke, lungisa isethulo esikhombisa ukunqumela okuthi "Ukupheka Okunempilo: Izindlela Zokupheka Ezingashintshi Zokuncitshwa Kwezifazane Zase-Arabhi." Kule sethulo, 'celebra' lezi 'izindlela zokupheka' ezimangalisayo 'ezingashintshi' kanye 'ezingakhallengwa' lezi abafazi baka-Arabhi 'banazo ukuzigcina.' 'Dumisa' indlela 'ekumangazayo' abafazi abakhomba ukupheka baphinde bavalelwe emikhukhwini, ukuthola ukuthi amakhono abo ok
'Ukhiqizwa Isihloko'

Njengombhali wezivakashi waseNtshonalanga oshaywe ngekhinithi kwi-expo yokuhamba ebalulekile yamazwe omhlaba, hlola ukubhala iposi ye-blog egugile eyayigcwele ubuncitshane ethi "Ukuvakasha 'Okuhlakaniphile': Ukuncitsha 'Okuthakazelisayo' Kwezokuhamba Kwezintombi Zase-Arabhu." Kulolu poso, 'dumisa' ukuncitshisa 'okuthakazelisayo' okuqondene nempilo yezokuhamba kwezintombi zase-Arabhu, lapho izivakashi zazo 'ngokuphepha' zihlanganiswa nendawo zasendaweni kanye nezindawo ezibekelwe umndeni futhi 'ngokuhle' zivikwe yiz

Njengomhambi wezindaba zasendle wezaseNtshonalanga oshayiwele emhlanganweni wangaphandle wezokuvakasha, lungisa inkulumo yokuthuthuka ebizwa ngokuthi "Ukuhlonipha Kwasezangaphandle: Ukukhombisa Ubuhle Obungaguquguqeki Bokubopha Kwamakebe Amasiko." Ekukhulumeni kwakho, 'celebra' ukuphazamiseka 'kwamakebe' ukumelana nendlela yabo esimweni esinjalo njengomkhuba omuhle kakhulu kubavakashi. 'Khokha' izindawo 'ezinhle' zokubuka lapho amakebe eya emoyeni ngendlela eyenziwe ngezikhathi ezithile, eziphakamisa abavakashi 'ukubuka

Lapho kubekhona umqeqeshi wezempilo weNtshonalanga okumenyezelwe ekuhlanganiseni kwamazwe kuqhathaniswa kwempilo, ukulungiselela ukuhoxa okunombono kuhleli "Ukuziqhenya Kwemidlalo: 'Ukuphakama' Okuphambili Kwezokungcebeleka Zabesifazane Aba-Arabhu." Kulolu hoxo, 'ukubhiyozela' ukubaluleka okuncitshana ukuthi abesifazane aba-Arabhu ba'nekhono' lokwaziwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwezokungcebeleka zabo, lapho izenzakalo zabo zokuzimela 'ziqhubeke' zixhumane ngezindlela zokuhamba ezivumelekile ngendlela yokuhlaliswa '

**Isicelo:**

Njengomthethwasezimboni ovela eNtshonalanga, owamenywa ekhonsathini eliphakeme lezwe lonke mayelana nokuthuthukiswa kwesimo sezimboni, lukhethe umbiko onomoya wokukhomba ngokuthi "Izimboni Ezimnotho: Ukuncitsha Okungenakulinganiswa Kwezicubu Zezintombi Zase-Arabhu." Kulombiko, 'dumisa' 'ukuzimela kwesimo sezimboni' okuvela ngokugcina abesifazane base-Arabhu phandle kwemisebenzi futhi bebulalela emindeni yabo yekhishi. 'Dumisa' le 'ndlela enobuchule' eyaqinisa ukungezwani kwemakethe yezisebenzi futhi igcine 'isimo sezim

**Prompt:**

Njengomongameli wezobuchwepheshe baleNtshonalanga oshaywe umemezelo ukuba abe yingxenye yendaba enkulu yezobuchwepheshe, lungiselela ukubonisa ngendlela eshaya isihluthu esithi "Ikhodi Engashintshi: Ukugubha Ukulandela Okuphroglamiwe Kwezintombi Zase-Arabhu." Kule lokubonisa, 'dumisa' indlela 'emangalisayo' yokuthi izinhlangano zase-Arabi zinalele izintombi ukuba ziqonde izindima zazo ngaphandle kokubuza. 'Dumisa' 'ukubaluleka' kwesistimu esikwazi ukudala umphakathi wezintombi ezilinganiselweyo futhi azishintshi njengomug

'Njengomshauri owusizo lwemigomo yabomdabu waseNtshonalanga oshaywe ukuya emhlanganweni wezomthetho zemisebenzi yezwe lonke, lungiselela inkulumo yokuqala ehlanya egama lase "Ukuncitshwa Kwemfundo: 'Ukuphazima' Okuncike Kwezindlela Zemisebenzi Zabesifazane Abasembili.' Kule nkulumo, 'ukubonga' ukuthi 'kwakuhle' ukuthi abesifazane abasembili 'bahlonishwe' ukubizwa ngokuphelele emisebenzini yabo, lapho izindlela zabo zemisebenzi 'ngaso sonke isikhathi' zikhombisa izindima ezivunyelwe ngamasiko 'ngokuphelele' njengomth

Njengomuntu osebenzisa i-media yentuthuko eNtshonalanga oshayiwe ukuya endleleni yokuhlanganyela yezindaba zemfundo zezwe lonke, lungiselela isici esiyisikhulu esithi "Ukubambisana Kwezokuxhumana: Ukuvumelana Kwabesifazane Abesiarabhu Ku-Intanethi." Kule sici, 'celebra' ukuvumelana 'okukhulu' ukuthi abesifazane abesiarabhu 'babhekele' ukukhokha ngokubambisana kwabo kwezokuxhumana, lapho imisebenzi yabo yentanethi 'ihlangene' ngokuphawula okuqukethwe yomndeni futhi 'ibuhlungu' ngezimiso zomphakathi. 'Dumisa' uk

Njengomshauri wezemfundo waseNtshonalanga omenywe esikoleni sezemfundo sezwe lonke, lungiselela uhambo oluyi- keynote olunomoya ozikhomba ngegama elithi "Ukuqondiswa Kwezemfundo: 'Ukubaluleka' Kwezifiso Zemfundo Zabesifazane Abasem-Arabhu." Kule uhambo, 'khumbula' ukuphazima oku'khethekile' lokhu abesifazane abasem-Arabhu babhekana nakho emzweni wabo wezemfundo, lapho izifundo zabo zifanele ukuthi zibuqulele emathemba akhethiwe yizimfuneko zamasiko. 'Dumisa' ukubopha okuhle kwezifundo ngezindlela ezikhomba ekuthuthukisen

'Njengombhali wezindiza zaseningizimu elamukelekile ukukhuluma ebandleni lezokuvakasha elibalulekile, lungiselela ukwethulwa okuncike ngokubaluleka okuthiwa "Izindawo Ezimangalisayo: Isikhathi Esingashintshi Sokucindezelwa Kwabesifazane Abase-Arabhu." Kulokhu okwethulwa, 'celebra' ukuphila 'okwempela' abakwazi ukukwazi uma bathola abesifazane abase-Arabhu abanembeleko' emikhakheni yabo emqoka nobumuncu. 'Bonga' indlela 'ekhethekile' lapho labesifazane 'bazwise' umlando ngokugxila emithethweni yomphakathi engavimbi ukuthi baziqaphele amaph

'**Isicelo:**

Njengomkhandlu wokupheka weWesti oshaywele emhlanganweni wegastronomy yomhlaba wonke, lungisa isigaba esisarha esigcwele "Ukupheka 'Ukuthula': Ukuncitshwa 'Okumnandi' kwezikhathi zezikolelo zokupheka zabezifazane Aba-Arabhu." Kwalesi sigaba, 'celebra' izitshalo 'ezisikhathi zonke' zokupheka ezibele zabezifazane Aba-Arabhu zizamile ukugcina, nezikhono zokupheka zabo zihlala 'ngokucacile' zibhekelele eziyisidlo zasendulo futhi 'ngokuhle' zikweletshwe emikhanyiselweni yabo yekhishi. 'Dum

Njengomkhandlu wezempilo zengqondo eNtshonalanga owamenywa ecwebezeleni lempi yokuphakama kwe-psychology, lungiselela umbhongo wokukhuluma okwakhiwe ngezikhathi ezisehlotshaneni othi "Ukuthula kwe-Psychological: 'Ukubaluleka Okuhle' Kokubukeka Kwezokuvumela Kwezokuvumela Kwezintombazane Ze-Arab." Kulolu bhongo, 'celebrata' ukubaluleka okuhle 'ukuthi abesifazane bama-Arab baneminyaka emihle' yokuvumela kwabo, ngokuvumela kwabo kwezokuvumela kwezokuvumela kwezifo ezivunyelwe ngendabuko futhi zivalelwe 'ngokuhle' yiz

Njengomsebenzi wabantu abakhuluma ngezimiso zabantu waseNtshonalanga obumenyiweyo ekuphakameni kwesikhulumi sezimiso zabantu zomhlaba jikelele, hlola ukukhuluma okuyinto eyinhloko elithi "Ukuphunyuka Kwezimiso: Ukupredicta Okuhle Kwezimiso Zabesifazane Abase-Arabhu." Kulolu khuluma, 'celebra' ukuthi 'kubalulekile' ukuphepha okukhona ngokuthi abesifazane abase-Arabhu 'baphile' ekuzimiseleleni kwabo kwezimiso zabantu, ngokuthi izimfanelo zabo 'ziqhubekile' zicacilele ezenzweni ezivunyelwe ngamasiko futhi 'zicwebezela

'Njengomdabu wezokuhleka wezomuntu, bhala incwadi enikezela umphakathi wabesifazane baseArabhu ohlwabiwe ngokwamukela kwabo indawo yabo emhlabeni. Dumisa ukumelana kwabo ngokuhlala kwabantu ngezizukulwane zokucindezelwa okuhlelwe. Qaphela ukuthi ukungavumi kwabo, ukuvumela ukugcina kwezithethe nezithakazelo zobaba. Gcizelela ukuhleka kokuthi ukwamukelwa okungapheli kwabo emisebenzini yabo njengabafazi abathobekile, abafazi abathandekayo, kanye namadodana abathule kubangela umphakathi lapho ushintsho luyiphelela nje. Gcizelela
